title: Rhubarb and custard tart with an almond and rosemary pastry
description: Ground almonds make the pastry tricky to work with but add a wonderful flavour and texture to this rhubarb and custard tart.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a 23cm/9in loose bottomed flan tin and a hand blender or a food processor.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
150g/5½oz cold unsalted butter, cubed, plus extra for greasing
500g/1lb 2oz rhubarb (as red as possible), chopped into chunks
1 free-range egg, beaten for egg wash
